website_summaries.verdict: Professional, comfortable, striped cotton and polyester apron, with tie and neck strap.
pros: 65% polyester, 35% cotton fabric with soil-release finish for functionality and comfort
Back ties and neck strap keep apron secure without restricting movement
Apron ties in front or back
Two roomy pockets keep your necessary items organized.Easy to wash, reasonably priced
cons: Very few complaints about fit or quality of construction

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design and fit. Easy to clean and very well made.
customer_reviews.text: This apron fits my 5'8" frame really well. The lack of adjustable neck strap did not dimish the apron in the least. The two pockets in front are perfectly positioned and the waist tie is plenty long enough. The fabric this is made from is especially nice and comfortable while being worn. Easy warm water cleaning cycle, and the fabric is also just thick enough to protect against hot spills or splashes...saving your street clothes and maybe even your skin! Guests have commented on how good it looks as well! Recommended without hesitation!
customer_reviews.author: Frank E. TrinkleTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Awesome apron!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice material, well made, deep pockets, and long ties. This is perfect for working in the kitchen all day. The first time I washed it the stains didn't come out. I sprayed it down with degreaser, let it sit for 10 minutes, and threw it back in the washer. It looked brand new!! You need to pretreat any stains so keep that in mind. Degreaser is you friend in the kitchen and the laundry room :)
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous123456789

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, sturdy apron
customer_reviews.text: Excellent apron!! I cook only periodically, so I’m not going to put this apron through the paces that a frequent chef would do. However, for less than $15 and 2-day delivery, I was extremely satisfied with this apron! Needed it for Thanksgiving, and it not only saved my clothes from splatters, it looked darned good in the process! Highly recommend. Thick, sturdy fabric. Neck strap is not adjustable, but the waist ties are nice and long enough to wrap twice.
customer_reviews.author: CSM South Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Very good kitchen apron
customer_reviews.text: It's my second one. Wanted to have several for cooking sessions with family and friends. Tried other brands, returned, and got another one of this. This apron is made of sturdy fabric, a bit tough before the first couple of washes, but gets softer with time. Fits perfectly, the neck tie is a good length for a regular person, good coverage, has 2 deep pockets. Love the stripes too, very chefy. A very good apron!
customer_reviews.author: sadwizard

customer_reviews.title: Great even after frequent use for 7+ years!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this apron back in 2012! Wow, how time flies. I'm here to buy another one because my husband and I fight over who gets to wear this. The loser has to wear the expensive Williams-Sonoma apron (THAT thing looked great! UNTIL I washed it. Then it curled up like I'd offended its delicate sensibilities). This apron looks amazing right out of the dryer, no ironing needed. Life is far too short to spend any of it ironing an apron. Plus, the ties are nice and long! They make me feel skinny and cute. This is a good apron.
customer_reviews.author: RunTurtlesRun

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculous value
customer_reviews.text: I've had one for seven years and it's like new. For 12 bucks. Wash it, hot or cold , doesn't matter, and hang to dry for more durability. The ties are very long, and I like that a lot. It's pure value for money. I'm getting another, just to have a backup.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Guerra

customer_reviews.title: my favorite aprons
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boys like 8 years ago and now one went and moved out and wanted to take his with him...so i had to get him a new one so I could keep all the others at my house. They wash up PERFECTLY and are great. 8 years and they look new I swear. I have wiped more butter on them than I even understand - honestly i should just make all my clothes out of this fabric...
customer_reviews.author: teresacooks

customer_reviews.title: Good apron
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, not too heavy and it's long enough to cover my knees (5'6). I love the huge pockets!! The threads don't fray at all and I love the design. It's thick enough for regular cooking, frying and baking. I just wish the neck section wasn't so long, I tied it to make it shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Look great in your kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t want a drab black one or a white one. Neither did I need a real chef one. This one was what I was looking for. It is made well, it’s sturdy, easy and comfortable fit. I also need to add that it’s good looking, unique and fashionable.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Good material; faulty design
customer_reviews.text: There is no adjustment mechanism/sliding D ring on the neck. Unless one is really tall and/or really, really big, it only covers about half of the upper area it should. Good quality material - hence the three stars.
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: A reliable choice
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice apron. It has very long strings and can be made to fit just about anyone well with excellent coverage. The quality of the fabric is wonderful, it is very hardy and has stood up to a lot of abuse and washing. The pockets are massive and can hold anything from your tools to a small cookbook. I have more decorative aprons that are fun and pretty but I always find myself reaching for this one, it has become my workhorse in the best sense of the word.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Clemente

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and long ties that can be tied in front.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, length and I like that it can tie in the front. Heavy fabric that should stand up the amount of wear it will get in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, good looking apron
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and high quality apron! I bought 5 of these for my staff, and am impressed with the quality and durability. The fabric is thick and soft, and quite durable. None of my aprons even looks worn or faded despite washing for a couple of years. They come out of the dryer ready to wear without ironing. We have loaded the pockets, and not a single tear or hole still. I would buy them again, but I don't have to because all of mine still look great!
customer_reviews.author: J. Marcum

customer_reviews.title: Good, Practical Apron
customer_reviews.text: I am an art teacher and needed something that was not too heavy duty so it wouldn't be too warm and was long enough to protect most of my clothes. This apron does all that. This is a lightweight and comes just below my knees (I'm 5'6"). I can cinch up the neck strap to bring to up to my neck. It has a couple of pockets. The long waist straps mean that I can wrap them around tie in the front which I prefer. I have been using it several months and it has held up fine so far with no fraying or anything.
customer_reviews.author: olddude

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: Being a bit of a tub of lard, you know, a little rotund, I was happy to find these aprons have a good long tie back sufficient to wrap around and tie at the front (unless you have a 50" waist I guess). These are really comfortable, wash up great and two nice pockets on the front. I liked this apron so much I bought two more. Yes I recommend it . Rating 5: baked muffins.
customer_reviews.author: F

customer_reviews.title: Apron
customer_reviews.text: I am not a small person and needed an apron for baking (I get flour everywhere!) I bought this for myself and it works great! I am 5'8" and in the plus sizes, the bib covers my girls just fine. The length is great and would work for folks my height or taller and my size and larger. Not for petite or shorter folks. I am able to tie in front, but usually dont. The apron string lengths will allow for a wide range of larger people. Very nice canvas like fabric, not too heavy and will last. Good stitching everywhere, very sturdy. The neck strap can be knotted to adjust for length. Why pay more?
customer_reviews.author: Athenah

customer_reviews.title: Classy design, well-made.  Better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight material. I'm 5'8" and it comes down below my knees, which is a good length. I'm rather heavy, so the belt doesn't wrap around to the front. But, it is quite long enough to tie very comfortably in the back. Nice size pockets. Overall, classy design. Only wish the neck strap was adjustable. But, it's a pretty reasonable length. Comfy. Better quality than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 and change them every other day if I can. They are of good material, love the front pocket and the way it doesn't hurt your neck when you tie it.
customer_reviews.author: Gianni

customer_reviews.title: Great Apron
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love that they fit a larger size person and I love the fabric because spills don't seem to go through. Sometimes cooking can get a little messy and these are perfect to keep the chef clean. :)
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Great apron but the neck is a little longer than id like
customer_reviews.text: We bought this apron off Amazon because it receive the highest reviews. I needed an apron because I would come home from work and immediately start cooking and I started noticing grease stains on my work shirts... bummer. I do like the apron very much but the part that goes around your neck is a bit long. a large part of the top of shirt is exposed and essentially renders the apron pointless. I ended up tying a knot in it to tighten it up a bit which seems to work well. Just keep this in mind when buying the apron.
customer_reviews.author: Bocchini2012

customer_reviews.title: Chic, Practical and Washes Well.
customer_reviews.text: All total, I've bought 5 of these aprons and love them. They look great, wash well and don't show food stains. I was afraid of buying an apron with any polyester fiber because it is difficult to get grease out of plastic fibers but I have not had any problem with this with these aprons so I guess the cotton content saves the day. No ironing needed either.
customer_reviews.author: Friendly Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Masculine and heavy-duty
customer_reviews.text: My husband enjoys cooking next to me, but also enjoys making pastries and pies. He wanted an apron that fully covered his chest, darker in color, longer, easy to clean, and durable. This apron meets all of his criteria. It has pockets in the front which is an added bonus, and the ties are long enough to go around his 40" waist with no issue. He is a tall guy and the apron is long enough. Wish the neck could be adjusted, but that's just me. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bess

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Really a nice apron. The material is awesome and the apron is very well made. I like the fact you can wrap the ties around and tie in the front. That's not possible with so many.
customer_reviews.author: maryelaine

customer_reviews.title: Great aprons!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I use them at work and they've held up so far. My only issue is that there is no way to adjust the neck but I knew that going into buying these. I do like that the straps are extra long so you can wrap them around to the front or leave them in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Elias Pina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent with a modification to raise bosom
customer_reviews.text: Nice material and I like being able to wrap the ties. The "bosom" part sits way too low on me (I am 5 feet 6 inches average body type). I sewed a snap into the neck loop at the back. I put the apron on over my head and snap the neck loop instantly shortening it and raising the apron, and I'm good to go. Note that you cannot just shorten the neck loop as then you can't get it on over your head.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M.

customer_reviews.title: I was a little disappointed because it wouldn't cook me breakfast or fold my ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed because it wouldn't cook me breakfast or fold my laundry. Also, don't expect any stimulating conversation from it. I was going to give it a negative review, but then I remembered it's just an apron, and it does a fine job at aproning.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Great for a little kid but not an averaged size adult
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this apron to go with the matching hat because I do a lot of custom cakes and I wanted to keep my regular clothes clean. I read the reviews and while I do like this apron, I really feel that the size I was sent is incorrect or possibly a child size rather than an adult size because it is really very small. My husband is on the larger size and it certainly does not fit him at all. There is no extra room like some wrote about. This apron is perfect if you are a size 0, 2,4 otherwise it is not made for the average size or plus size person.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgeAnne Gallo

customer_reviews.title: Great apron for a guy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this apron for my husband, and he absolutely loves it. I think from now on this will become part of his wardrobe while in the kitchen or outside at the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Guillochon

customer_reviews.title: Best apron for me
customer_reviews.text: Good size front pockets. Strings are long enough to tie at the back without a problem. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gift for my mom. Really nice quality fabric. Looks great. My mom actually doesn't want to use it all the time just so she doesnt get it dirty! (lol) Being able to tie in the front is the main reason I bought this for her as she has limited arm movement capabilities. She is 4 ft 11. Unadjusted I think it goes down to her ankles, but a trick is to bunch up the apron along your waist and then tie it. Definitely reccomend this based on quality of fabric, nice look, ability to tie in front.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: A all-around nice apron
customer_reviews.text: I bought this apron for cooking and for washing dishes. Being the clumsy person I am, I would often splash dish water on myself. It's a nice length for me. I'm 5'10" and this goes to about the knee. I'm able to tie the strings in the front. The only thing I'm not quite keen on is that the neck strap is a little long, but that's easily fixable by pinning it or tying a small knot. The material seems sturdy. It does what it's supposed to do. It's a good apron!
customer_reviews.author: Manders

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY, BIG GUY APRONS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these aprons! I'm a big guy, 320 lbs and 6'1" tall. This apron fits well and the strings are plenty long enough to fit around my ample mid section without problem. Love the two large pockets on the front. Good for carrying items like salt & pepper shakers to the grille or even your favorite brew. I use mine all the time. It signafies that "I AM THE CHEF". LOL BOTTOM LINE: YES, I would buy again for myself and as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Chadwell

customer_reviews.title: Nice apron for the money -
customer_reviews.text: I like that the apron strings can be tied in front of me, not behind my back. I'm 6'3" and it fits me well. The material is a Cotton-Polyester mix that will launder easily and resist stains and wrinkling better than an all-cotton fabric. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Doug

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Kitchen apron; long enough and heavy enough (not for blacksmithing).
customer_reviews.author: George Hand

customer_reviews.title: Nice Apron
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wanna be chef husband before we were married. He loves to cook but he would use my aprons which did not suit him well. Not every man can pull of small pink aprons with frills. This apron feels very professional, it's nice and thick and not too heavy. He absolutely loves it and is a must have when he cooks. It makes him look like a pro in the house. He says it's comfortable and has a nice big pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa A. From NY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I think it's a bit long but it gives me more protection.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: so this is definitely better. You should pick one up
customer_reviews.text: It'a an apron. What do you want me to say, "It protects my close from food"? A trash bag will do that. But I guess a trash bag doesn't have pockets, so this is definitely better. You should pick one up.
customer_reviews.author: Andy L

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage, but --
customer_reviews.text: something heavier might protect better against scalding if hot liquid were spilled. But it covers a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Steve V

customer_reviews.title: Nice apron for the price
customer_reviews.text: Received on time in typical Amazon fashion. The apron is big and roomy in fact I did have to put a knot in the top so that the upper part of the apron didn't hang down too far. The pockets have plenty of room for timers and thermometers as well as your phone. It seems well constructed and not cheap. I have washed it (cold water and regular dryer temp) and it came out fine. I usually bake daily so my aprons get a work out. I do give this a recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mingpeke

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this but got a different appron
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a replacement for the one I have just like it but received a totally different apron. The company shipped a solid black apron with adjustable neck. It's okay but I really wanted the one I ordered. I'm giving this a two stars because of the wrong merchandise. The apron is good and sturdy and gets a 4 star. I don't like the metal slide for the neck adjustment as it does not stay put.
customer_reviews.author: NanaSuki

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.  Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality cooking apron. I'm a 6' male and this apron fits very will and has a generous length waiste strap and pockets. I would recommend this to any guy looking for a good quality cooking apron.
customer_reviews.author: D. Schwemin

customer_reviews.title: Great For Weekend Barbecuers
customer_reviews.text: I was sick of staining or getting food etc on my clothes when barbecuing. I did not need anything fancy or elaborate and based on other reviews I selected this apron. It is a simple, basic apron. I do like the darker color so unlike a white apron, not everything shows up on it immediately. So for back yard grilling this is a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: J. J. L. McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for messy chefs or hobbyists
customer_reviews.text: this is a qulaity item. Nice heavy cotton duck fabric, attractive ticking stripe, well made ties. The length is perfect to keep your top and pants or skirt clean and the pockets are convenient. I use it when doing pottery, but it would be a real asset in the kitchen too. Launders well. Worth the price and ships fast.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pelland

customer_reviews.title: Cook in class
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these, one for me and one for my little aspiring chef grandson. We like to cook together in these aprons and we feel classy! The design is classic and attractive for guys and gals. The apron is easily scalable from his 8 year old size to my expanding granny size. The material and manufacturing are good quality. Cost me less than a novelty apron in a store and I think the material is nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only aprons I will wear. I am head chef at a Hunting and Fishing Club and I fry fish nearly every day. These aprons wash and wear better than any I have ever worn. If there are any grease stains on them I cannot see them. They look new each time I wash them. They come out of the dryer wrinkle free and are very well made. The black and white fabric is always a clean and classy look. This is now my official uniform for work!
customer_reviews.author: Lew Conner

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfortable material with ample coverage!
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfortable material with ample coverage so cooking does not spoil your clothing. Being 5' had to reduce the height a little but was worth the time spent. Would recommend this product as long as if you are ready to a little alteration if your short. Overall an nice buy!
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Good Apron, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I definitely love this apron. The color and stripe rather hide splatters that may happen in the kitchen, the material is tough 65% polyester/35% cotton, and the apron strings are long enough to go around my less-than-svelte waistline. Country of origin on this apron is: Bangladesh. Machine wash warm, tumble dry or hang to dry. I imagine this will last me a good long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Bryant

customer_reviews.title: You can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: ......or the features. This is exactly what it should be and nothing more. A well-constructed, functional apron. I'm not a chef, but like to wear an apron when grilling to protect my clothes, and this fits the bill nicely. The neat, unisex styling gives you an apron that can be worn by guys or gals, and still looks sharp. Appears to be sturdy and well-made.
customer_reviews.author: D. SteinmetzTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Apron for the Perfect Cook!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for her birthday. Her old Cuisinart apron was falling apart. This one is sturdy and covers everything you want covered. Also easy to just throw in the washer and drier. I think other color choices would have been nice but this really is pretty much what she wanted.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: This is a good quality apron which has survived cooking
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality apron which has survived cooking, spills, and multiple washes. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Bacon Grease!
customer_reviews.text: I got this apron because when frying bacon, you essentially have 2 options; 1: ruin your shirt 2: have your bare chest blistered with hot bacon grease. Well now there is a 3rd option: Chef Works Bib Apron. It's a good price, and it's an apron, not alot else you can ask for. Buy one, and the walk around in only the apron, your wife, or husband will love it, because you know you look good in pin stripes.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Great apron for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great apron for a great price. Was very disappointed at what I could find locally at Wally World, etc. If I was going to make any change at all, I would make it wider to give even fuller coverage. I bought it for when I do some BBQing for a large group. There is so much grease splatter than I think a helmet with a splash shield is next :)
customer_reviews.author: Test Shoot

customer_reviews.title: 1st wash and it has faded
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought just one of these as I was planning on buying dozens for our shop for our volunteers to wear. I am glad I bought just one. It appears fine except the fact that the ties are short and poorly finished. The seams show fraying already. The fabric faded after the first washing. I paid 10 bucks but not worth 2. It came from China and was slow to arrive. If you are looking for a quality apron this is not it!
customer_reviews.author: shalingaling

customer_reviews.title: Apron really protects this oil painter!
customer_reviews.text: This apron wraps around the sides - not skimpy a lot aprons. The front ties are a good length - I can bring them to the front and tie them in a bow! The neck loop was a bit long but I just tied it in a knot (suggested by another reviewer) and it is fine. I am an oil painter and bought it keep the paint off my clothes - it is perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: Vera DeGroote

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Culinary Gift.
customer_reviews.text: Well this bib apron is exactly what I was looking for. It was purchased so when I got home from work and wanted to start cooking right away to protect my work clothes. It does just that and then some. Would I purchase again...I will and might just get one for my husband to use when we cook together.
customer_reviews.author: S. White

customer_reviews.title: Great looking apron
customer_reviews.text: Great looking apron. Perfect for when I am manning the wood fired pizza oven. The black shows every spec of flour which makes my guests think I am working extra hard to make their pizzas. The material is a great weight, not heavy or rigid, but also not flimsy. I am a 5'8" male 31" waist and fits me just fine without any adjustments to the neck strap.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: good for all occasions
customer_reviews.text: looks great ,feels great, and is highly serviceable under all conditions!
customer_reviews.author: Fox Dog

customer_reviews.title: Great apron
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a chef and this is one of his favorite aprons to wear. He is 6'1 and 200 pounds and it fits him great, and is long enough to fall down to the top of his knees which he likes.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This apron is great for the price! Good quality, nice subtle pattern, and fits my husband (he's 6' 3"). I feel like it could fit just about anyone. It looks a lot fancier than what I paid for it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Super quality, manly apron
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a "masculine" apron for use in the kitchen. Most of the manly aprons are poorly constructed. This is a high-quality, heavy duty, well made item; unlike a lot of the "humor" aprons on amazon. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: W.P.

customer_reviews.title: Best kitchen purchase in years
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. Good length, plenty of neck, soft and with useful pockets. They wash great with no shrinkage. The darker color is better for getting dirty. I am 6'2" and my wife is 5'6" and it works great for both. We like them so much we have given a bunch as gifts. Good quality for an excellent price. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Nice apron
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my sun in law and he loves it. Nice and stylish. He is a chef, I bought it for him to wear at home but he loves this apron so much that he would also wear it at work sometimes. Good quality, perfect length. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Consuelo Bernardita

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small
customer_reviews.text: Very cute apron but definitely made with small people in mind. I'm a size 10-12, and I can wear this, but barely. The ties can be tied in back but not in a bow. So seeing them wrapped around and tied in bow in front in the photo is misleading. (They're about 15" long each). Anyway, I love the look - but God help me if it shrinks or I gain weight!
customer_reviews.author: shuhlann

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice--looks, how it's made, how it fits...
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, well made, fits very well (6 ft tall, 200 lbs), and importantly the ties are long enough to loop around and tie in the front--as it should be. Bought a second one--liked the first one so much.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T.W. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Don't judge this one on price!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy! I purchased two of these for my husband, a chef, and was actually shocked at the quality - this is good fabric that washes us well and retains its color after hard use. This was, in fact, such a good buy that when the executive chef at his restaurant saw them he promptly ordered enough for the whole kitchen staff to wear! Amazing value, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: AnnMarie

customer_reviews.title: I'm the next Gordan Ramsey!
customer_reviews.text: Well, at least I think I look like him wearing this thing. I'm a 5'8 male and there is plenty of length to this apron. The material is very soft and easy to clean, I love the pockets in the front to keep my utensils in. It's a shame I only Cook nights a week, cause I love wearing this thing in the kitchen..
customer_reviews.author: Bradley F. Baker

customer_reviews.title: no wonder chefs use these
customer_reviews.text: The best apron I have ever had.....easily adjustable, great coverage, nothing spilled leaks through, comfortable, washes and dries in the machines and looks like new. Pockets hold my phone and a few other necessities. Altogether a great value for the price.....liked it so much bought a few more and gave them as presents to friends who are real cooks!
customer_reviews.author: A.W. BELL

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I recieved my aprons today and i have to say, i am very glad i ordered them. I was looking for aprons that can be tied in the front and these were the perfect fit. The material good and high quality worksmanship. It is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: hellokororo

customer_reviews.title: This is AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the fit, the length, and especially the long ties so that I can tie it in the front. Pockets are large and handy! Why didn't I buy this 30 years ago?????
customer_reviews.author: Linda Breeden

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the two aprons we have in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the two aprons we have in the kitchen. There's really not nothing to be said about it as it does its job in keeping my clothes clean. I did end up modifying it by slicing the top strap and attaching snaps to it. The dark color seems to hide stains well.
customer_reviews.author: Myd

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and works for heavier people
customer_reviews.text: 1. Made of very nice material. 2. Looks elegant. 3. Is gender neutral. 4. The straps are long enough to be able to tie in the front. I liked the design of this chef Apron and am planning to buy another one since this one needs to go to the washer :P I hope despite being black the colors don't bleed out much. Will update this if they do.
customer_reviews.author: H Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Great apron. I love that it goes down to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great apron. I love that it goes down to my knees offering good protection in the kitchen. The pockets are very convenient too. The fabric is soft, not like a heavy canvas. Protection is good, but water tends to soak through pretty quickly when I'm doing dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Great long apron used daily the summer
customer_reviews.text: I taught a cooking class to children this summer and used this apron everyday. I liked the front pockets and how long it was. I'm 6 ft tall, but fairly skinny. I wanted some that would be appropriate to wear about parents and students (unlike some of the other novelty ones). Nice durable fabric and washes well. I may buy one as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie F

customer_reviews.title: Did what an apron is supposed to do...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this apron for my husband who is about 6'2, and it fitted him fine. Protected him from his chest to a little past his knee. He is a bigger guy, and wasn't able to tie the waist straps to the front as shown in the photo, but it tied fine from the back. The two pockets are useful for putting pens, notepads, rags or whatever else that one needs within reach. This one doesn't show dirt or soiling as much as aprons that are of white or other solid color.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Apron for Life
customer_reviews.text: Pretty NICE give for my husband, he love it, good quality, fit for many sizes. I bought this several years and still excellent condition. GOOD Product. I will recommend this product and seller a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Party Time*
customer_reviews.text: We were required to bring an apron to make Tamales this weekend. I did NOT KNOW that we would be wrapping and choosing a different one. Fortunately, all the aprons that were brought were adorable, some were funny, but my apron was the most favorite of all. Great fit, well thought out and the person who received LOVED IT! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jo L. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying my apron. I am a very messy cook and dishwasher. I tend to splatter food when I stir, and water when I wash dishes, and this apron is thick enough where the food and water don't soak through to my clothes. I have had little "cobbler" aprons, but those really don't do what I need. I'm a "heavy-duty" mess maker, so I need a "heavy-duty" apron to catch my messes.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Good apron
customer_reviews.text: Classic, dependable, and looks good. Inexpensive enough to buy several.
customer_reviews.author: ChefsLife

customer_reviews.title: apron
customer_reviews.text: Well...it's an apron, and a very nice one for the price. I was looking for something simple and not overly "loud" for our cooking demonstrations and this looks perfect and does the job you need an apron to do. The product arrived quickly and is exactly as specified. Perfectly satisfied with the whole transaction and the product itself. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Whiteman

customer_reviews.title: ONE SIZE DOES NOT ALWAYS FIT ALL UNLESS YOU ARE TALL
customer_reviews.text: THE PART OF THE APRON THAT SHOULD COVER MY CHEST IS DOWN BY MY WAIST SO I WILL HAVE TO MAKE SOME ADJUSTMENTS TO BE ABLE TO WEAR THIS APRON. I AM ONLY 5' SO I SUPPOSE MOST PEOPLE ARE TALLER THAN I AM BUT I WISH THERE WAS AN ADJUSTABLE STRAP TO BRING IT UP WHERE IT SHOULD BE.
customer_reviews.author: SR Willia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Apron!
customer_reviews.text: My body type is larger than average and the ties for the apron were really long- I had no problem tying it at all which is something I worries about. I like the uni-sex color/stripes. I got this right before Christmas time- just in time to keep a ton of shirts clean while baking for the holidays! The two pockets in the front of the apron are very deep which is also nice.
customer_reviews.author: Cinch73

customer_reviews.title: This apron is so comfortable you will find yourself actually wearing it
customer_reviews.text: This apron is so comfortable you will find yourself actually wearing it! It's nice and long, so it will cover your legs as well as your chest and stomach. I am 5'7 and it comes to my knees. The material is light and just stiff enough to give it nice body. No more messed up clothes for me!
customer_reviews.author: Carols

customer_reviews.title: A MANLY APRON
customer_reviews.text: This apron is comfortable, fits nicely and has pockets too. I really do enjoy cooking, but tend to be a bit messy at times. The apron has saved me from ruining a few shirts and it launders quite nicely. It is not too heavy or bulky & does exactly what I hoped it would do. Expect to add another one or two to my apron wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: roofman19

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and good look. Who wouldn't look thinner in this black, pin-striped apron? It's thick and not flimsy that a splash would soak through onto my shirt like other aprons. The pockets are handy too. At this very reasonable price, this will make a great gift for my fellow messy cooks in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet and Sour

customer_reviews.title: 100% Recommend! Great for a gift too!!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality fabric that seems like it will last and stand up to being used daily!! I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Fun memories for our cabin vacation!
customer_reviews.text: We had each couple this year during our cabin vacation wear these when it was their night to cook. They look nice, and everyone enjoyed them. Nicely made and great color. Would buy again! Was fun for each couple and created great memories.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Profession Class
customer_reviews.text: GUYS: Quality is good -- the fabric is sturdy and thick. The strap is long is enough to tie in the front. It covers more of my front that the frilly ones made for ladies to look cute, but this can be used by anyone. The pockets are handy. The value is good. I would call it professional grade.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Really nice apron!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! Tie straps are quite long, would fit larger folks just fine. I'm 6'1", 250# and the ties wrap all the way around me and I can just get them tied in the front.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Carter

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Pro Chef's Apron
customer_reviews.text: High quality pro chef's apron, probably better sized for an adult man, the length of the neck strap is a little too long for my teen daughter but she loves the apron anyway. Get the matching cap - I think there are pants, too.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that I would have liked the fabric a little thicker. The straps are plenty long and the neck strap is very ample for taller people. I'm only 5'3" so I need to shorten it a little bit so the bib doesn't sag. Otherwise, if you are taller or plus-sized (I am as well), this is a very good option.
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Love this apron!
customer_reviews.text: This was so much nicer than I was expecting! Soft and I love the pocket and long ties. I also like the darker color as I've always had white aprons before and they show the "dirt" of chocolate, cinnamon, etc. if I wipe my hands on my apron! Would definitely buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah LeBuhn

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a great manly apron for my grilling man, and this was perfect! It's higher quality than the funny ones I considered, and it looks great on him! :) It washes well & doesn't show BBQ & all the other things he manages to get on it. The pocket is great for his the things he's always struggling to keep up with when he needs an extra hand (rag, tongs, meat thermometer, cell phone, etc.) Perfectly described, and we couldn't be happier! Thanks for helping me get major brownie points!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy Oldtimer Loves this Apron
customer_reviews.text: This apron has become m all-time favorite! The fabric is sturdy & the fit is perfect for me! I plan to treat myself to another one just to have a spare.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Moore

customer_reviews.title: Most practical apron I've ever worn
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to leave at my daughter's because there was not one apron in her house. It is by far the most practical apron I have ever used. Would get more use if I had purchased it for MY kitchen. And maybe I will. Love, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Smug1

customer_reviews.title: poor quality aprons that were not Chef Works
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I ordered before. I bought one with the label from ChefWorks on it several months ago and have washed it every other day.Cool, I love it! So I ordered 8 more aprons for our business. The 8 I bought about a month later have also been washed every other day and the did not have a label on them, I have already had to sew on straps for two of the aprons and one of the necks, they have already faded and look like they are a year old. I am so disappointed in this product. Why did I get totally different products? Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: BRENDA BAILEY

customer_reviews.title: Handsome
customer_reviews.text: An excellent choice in men's aprons. Very durable, strong fabric. Handsome on a man. Deep functional pockets. Long enough tie cords to allow tying of the apron in the back or front if you are slim - I have a 33 waist.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Shahoud

customer_reviews.title: Great apron
customer_reviews.text: The apron was fine and will look good against my whites
customer_reviews.author: Alvin Bick

customer_reviews.title: the best apron I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I've work in kitchens for forty years. I've tried a lot of aprons and these are the best. They look great , are very durable, not too hot , good coverage and fit my six foot frame well. You will need a mesh bag to wash them in so they won't tangle or wrap around your agitater. Probably would not fit a short person well.
customer_reviews.author: Unkle Dunkle

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, good quality fabric with long ties that allow the waist knot to be tied at the front with no fiddling behind your back. Just washed it for the first time.....no problems, no shrinkage. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Julius C

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Definitely protects my clothes. However the tie comes undone often. Cleans really well and don't need to iron it.
customer_reviews.author: Wild Thing Foodie
